description: Paintr Lite is a creative application that enables users to create natural looking works of art by drawing and painting right on their mobile devices.  Watch as the canvas comes to life as though you were using real paint, thanks to the custom physics engine! Controls such as brush type, size, opacity, rich colors, and speed sensitivity allow you full control over your artistic creations.  In The Gallery, you can view thousands of user paintings, and submit your own works to share with the community!  Paintr Lite comes with detailed instructions, containing explanations of the various tools, drawing techniques, and instructions for saving you work. Try Paintr Lite for free today, and join the rapidly growing community of WebOS artists!
